privacyPolicy.intro: At Social Housing App, we respect your privacy. This page explains how your data is processed when using the application.

section1.content: Social Housing App collects the following data to improve user experience and service quality:
section1.item1: Calculation parameters (installment amount, income information, rent amount)
section1.item2: Device and browser information (user agent, IP address, language preference)

section2.title: 2. Data Usage
section2.content: Collected data is used for the following purposes:

section3.title: 3. Data Storage and Security
section3.content: Your data is stored on secure servers and protected against unauthorized access. Your personal data is not shared with third parties.

section4.title: 4. Cookies
section4.content: The application uses cookies to store user preferences and collect analytics data. You can disable cookies in your browser settings.

section5.title: 5. User Rights
section5.content: Under GDPR/KVKK, you can request access, correction, and deletion of your data. You can contact us to exercise these rights.

terms.metaDescription: Social Housing App terms of service and disclaimer.
terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using Social Housing App, you agree to the following terms.

section1.title: 1. Service Description
section1.content: Social Housing App is a free calculation and simulation tool developed to assist citizens considering TOKİ/Social Housing applications in their decision-making process.

section2.title: 2. Disclaimer
section2.content: This tool is for informational purposes only. Please note the following:
section2.item1: Calculations are estimates and may differ from official results
section2.item2: Actual installment amounts and increase rates are determined by TOKİ
section2.item3: For legal and official processes, refer to toki.gov.tr and evsahibiturkiye.gov.tr
section2.item4: Application developers cannot be held responsible for damages arising from calculation results

section3.title: 3. User Responsibilities
section3.content: Users are responsible for entering accurate information and should evaluate calculation results at their own risk and responsibility.

section4.title: 4. Intellectual Property
section4.content: Social Housing App is an open-source project (MIT License). Source code is accessible on GitHub.

section5.title: 5. Changes
section5.content: Terms of service may be updated without prior notice. Changes will:
section5.item2: Be deemed accepted when new terms take effect
section5.item3: Result in user notification for significant changes

section6.title: 6. Service Interruption
section6.content: Service is provided without interruption whenever possible, but interruptions may occur due to maintenance, updates, or technical issues.
